utils package¶

Submodules¶

utils.config_loader module¶

This utility script is for loading the configuration set out in the YAML file located in “config/config.yaml”

utils.config_loader.load_config(path: str = 'config/config.yaml') → dict¶

Loads YAML configuration as a dictionary

utils.config_loader.verify_files(config: dict) → list¶

Verifies that the required model file exists. Will return a list of missing file names.

Module contents¶

Multi-model Biomedical LLM
